     A ship came and smacked the ground by Maximal City.  It went skidding,=
 then it hit a tree and came to a halt.  It looked pretty damaged.  However=
, the bot inside wasn't, fortunately for the Maximals which he was most lik=
ely to join.  The pod scanned for a beast mode, and it chose....it chose...=
.It broke down.  So now, the bot inside, would have no organic anything, co=
mpletely mechanical.  He hadn't come out yet.  But, finally, the bot inside=
 burst out by firing a shot from some sort of energy weapon.  There was fla=
mes and scraps of the pod door everywhere.  The bot inside emerged, and wal=
ked out of the wreckage.

        "Ah finally, I've made it to this damned =
rock!  'Bout time!" the bot said, brushing some char and and stuff off of h=
im.

        The bot turned around to look at the rest of his pod.  He exta=
nded his arm, and spread out his fingers, so that his palm was facing the w=
reckage.  Then, a hole in his palm opened up, then a short spikey thing cam=
e out.  It charged up some swirling energy, then, fired a blast at the cras=
h site.  All of the scraps, grass and the tree were blown up to smithereens=
.  The spike thing went back inside of his hand, and the hole closed, and t=
hen he pulled back his arm, turned around and went walking towards Maximal =
City.

        "Heh, there's every need to fear, 'cause Weapon is here!" th=
e bot said, revealing his name to be Weapon...

        Weapon, from a safe=
 distance, stopped.  He pressed a few buttons and stuff, and eventually man=
aged to get a fairly large fusion cannon.  He aimed it at Maximal City, and=
 fired a blast from the fusion cannon at it.



~The Keeper of Souls~
~The =
Shadow of the Dark~
~I Am, The Lurker of the Abyss~

------=_NextPart_000_0032_01C13585.445AAC00
